attributes.action: We demand that this government resigns now.
attributes.additional_details:
The Tories are good for n0thing

0 for democracy
0 for equality of life, equality, justice
0 for health and social care
0 for housing
0 for education
0 for environmental protection and green energy
0 for transport and utilities
0 for the economy and trade
0 for immigration policy and foreign aid 
0 for world respect and leadership

0/10 = failed
attributes.background: The Tories have done huge damage to the country.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/641904
Call an immediate general election
